text: Wright State University is a public university in Fairborn, Ohio with a mailing address of Dayton. The university has about 19,793 students. It was founded in 1967. The current president of the university is Susan Edwards. The University is named after the Wright brothers. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Raiders. They have 17 varsity teams and they compete in the Horizon League. ==Other websites== *Wright State University's Official website *Wright State Raiders' Official athletics website Category:Horizon League Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1967 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Ohio
title: Wright State University
